Some cases of excitation,hyperpyrexia, mania, and convulsions, especially with serotonergicantidepressants such as clomipramine and imipramine, but manypatients have received combination without ill effects

Fluoxetine andparoxetine inhibit CYP2D6 and decrease metabolism of antidepressantsmetabolized by this enzyme (eg, desipramine)Citalopram, sertraline,and fluvoxamine are only weak inhibitors of CYP2D6, but fluvoxamineinhibits CYP1A2 and CYP3A4 and thus can inhibit the metabolism ofantidepressants metabolized by these enzymes
